entry.title: Thursday: Chance of snow. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of snow early this morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then snow mixed with rain beginning late in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h in the morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
